name: Orb of Blight
description: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

abilities.name: Lesser Corruption
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks apply an armor reducing debuff on enemy units.
notes: The bonus armor reduction value does not stack
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration
Affects Allied units, Buildings, and Ward-type units
Weaker sources do not reduce armor if a stronger source is present, except for Desolator and Stygian Desolator, which stack with each other
The ability effects are applied as follows: 1. The modifier_blight_stone_buff, 2. The wielder's attack instance

additionalInfo: Purchasable at the Main Shop under Equipment
Now builds into Orb of Corrosion

recentChanges.description: RENAMED item from Blight Stone to Orb of Blight. Reduced Lesser Corruption duration from 8 to 3. Now builds into Orb of Corrosion.
No longer builds into the following items: Medallion of Courage, Orb of Corrosion.
Now builds into Orb of Corrosion. Lesser Corruption no longer stacks with Corruption and Greater Corruption.
